selected_skills.name: read_bar_values_from_chart
selected_skills.purpose: Extract numerical values from a bar chart image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to extract the 'Satisfied' and 'Dissatisfied' response counts from the chart image.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to calculate the ratio of 'Dissatisfied' to 'Satisfied' responses.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the computed ratio as a floating-point number with one decimal place.
